description: Germany begins tough EU summit talks on emergency funds for stricken Europe.
title: Merkel warns coronavirus crisis 'still just the beginning'
title_page: Merkel warns coronavirus crisis 'still just the beginning' - BBC News
maintext: The view from Rome is that a shared crisis needs a shared solution. Facing fierce opposition mainly from Germany and the Netherlands, Italy may no longer be wedded to its idea of "coronabonds" - debt mutualisation - but is still pushing for a financial package that does not penalise any single economy. That, after all, is the spirit of the common market that Italy helped create.
